name: Logitech Zone Wireless Plus Bluetooth Headset | Dell USA
description: Take control of your acoustic environment with Zone Wireless Plus, the wireless headset specifically designed for busy workspaces. Connect the headset with up to five other Logitech unifying wireless products with a single USB Unifying Receiver, which plugs into the USB-A port on your computer and provides a reliable connection up to 10 meters away even in the busiest workspaces. Easily transition between phone chats, video conferencing, music, and general noise reduction as you wish - all with the same headset and happy-making acoustic performance. With all-day comfort and easy-to-use controls, Zone Wireless Plus is the sound choice for your open workspace.
